website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use covers provide quality protection from all weather conditions.
pros: Durable plastic clips and adjustable elastic bottom keeps cover securely attached
Thick fabric is water resistant with air ventilation pockets to keep out condensation
Conveniently placed handles allow for easy removal
Available in large or medium sizes
cons: Limited sizing options, covers are not ideal for smaller chairs

customer_reviews.title: Just don't hold up...
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I really liked the fit, color and feel. But as fall moved in, they would blow off the chairs easily. The drawstrings deteriorated quickly compounding the problem. After a few months in the sun, the material became weak and the fabric began to tear at the corners of the furniture. The pictured covers are exactly one year old. They just don't hold up. They were torn after 5 months. I tried an adhesive patch but it didn't take. I can give them 2 stars because if you have furniture that is protected from wind and sun, these would work fine as a nice dust cover. If your furniture is fully exposed, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Keyes

customer_reviews.title: ONLY 1 ALLOWED?????
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but when I tried to order 1 more for my other chair it would not allow me to purchase another. It said only 1 was allowed to be bought by a customer. So I guess I will spend my money with someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Who Dat

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving photo
customer_reviews.text: These seem decent quality for the price, but the photo clearly shows a form fitted cover for a chair. Low in the front, high in the back, as it should be for a chair. Actual product is uniform height all around. so if you put it over a square table, all sides would touch the ground evenly. So it covers my chairs yea, just sloppy and will collect water on the top. Nice handles on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for Protecting Furniture... Not Form-Fitting
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We bought two for our patio chairs and they survived the winter in Ohio. We left the cushions underneath and they kept the moisture out. Nothing smells mildewy, the covers seem to repel water and dry quickly. They didn't crack in the cold, and they hang on despite high winds. There are a few rips on the bottom seams where I imagine they blew some and rubbed against the patio, leaving the small holes. But, it's not going to impact its function. I will say they don't form-fit the chairs like the images shows, but if you can get past that, they're great for protecting furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Inexpensive - FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these patio lounge covers. I can't believe that I got them for so cheap! Usually, when you find something inexpensive, "you get what you pay for." With these covers, they could easily go for 4 times as much as what they're charging. These are thick, high quality, well sewn, covers that are easy to take on and off your patio furniture. I live in the Pacific Northwest. We get a lot of rain, and these things are absolutely brilliant. I am so impressed, and so surprised at how inexpensive they were, for the quality I received.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: Only good for a year. Can poke holes through it like cheap toilet paper. I bought because of the reviews. Apparently everyone else reviewed in the first year.
customer_reviews.author: darby j plath

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend this furniture cover
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC THICK AND STURDY MATERIAL. Best I've found so far. My previous one tore in a few months but this one I'm not worried about at all. The ties are also very sturdy but the elastic alone holds it down quite nicely. Has done an incredible job keeping my outdoor furniture clean and in good condition in very hot, dusty California weather, but I have a feeling this would do great in cold/wet conditions too. Went out and replaced all of my covers with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lipiskapa

customer_reviews.title: Look solidly built right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I'll come back to update if our opinion changes. We live right on the ocean and can get hit hard with both hot sun as well as rough New England weather so we need something able to survive. Initial reaction: solid construction with good seams stretch cord, straps and plastic connectors look like they'll last fabric is heavy duty and color is consistent between teh 2 items received (so far... several more coming this week) vents also look good and like they'll be effective
customer_reviews.author: arbrnrngr

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I bought this veranda patio chair cover for my grandmother, who lives in New Jersey and worries about how the changing summer weather can affect her outdoor furniture. Her previous covers had weathered poorly and were splitting at the seams, so this was well-needed. Fortunately, the material is tough and did a good job withstanding rain and heat for the couple months she had her furniture out for the season. The cover also includes a nice zippered plastic case to store it when it’s not needed. The size should fit most models of furniture well, though measure just in case.
customer_reviews.author: RDDTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Would I buy this brand again? Absolutely without hesitation.
customer_reviews.text: Listen. This is not a bribed review. Classic Accessories is a great value. You can't go wrong unless you all buy the item I want and they sell out before I can buy. Honestly, I have had this brand on outdoor chairs, umbrellas, and BBQs for three years. I wait to write reviews. Would I buy this brand again? Absolutely without hesitation. Best value on Amazon. This review is for my new chairs. See, I bought again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: I had some reservations about buying this as some of the reviews weren't the best. But after two summers, they are performing superbly. No rips or tears, no moisture getting through. And we've had a lot of rain in the past month. The only "negative" is that they're heavy and bulky but anything less probably wouldn't provide the protection needed. We store them in a deck box that stands about 32 inches high and is fairly narrow and it doubles as a table so we don't have to lug them to the shed when not in use. Recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: fantastic furniture cover!
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what I wanted for my screen deck furniture. I get rain, tree pollen and dust in the porch and this fantastic cover does the job. It is very strong material, doesn't blow off, protects from all the elements. It looks terrific as well, I would definitely recommend this furniture cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased last year for my chairs on the deck. They work great. They're very thick and work great. The price was amazing for these. Other websites wanted double the amount and I wasn't sure about these until I received. These are definitely high quality and thick, not thin, these will last for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: LDS

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Covers for a Budget Price.  Exceptional Buy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product to protect our new outdoor seating. We live in Florida on a saltwater canal and the combination of Sun, Humidity and Saltwater just ate through the cushions on our last patio furniture. These covers are great and come with snaps to secure to your furniture and keep the sun off and protect from the rain. Only a small amount of water seeped through after the last tropical storm that brought 5" of rain over 24 hours so exceptional protection at at great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So impressed with the fire pit cover
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the table/chair cover and 2 patio chair covers as well. This is a heavy cover which is what we need here on a hill in Ohio. Our wrought iron furniture is smaller than is made these days (over 50 years old) and it's impossible to find covers to fit. I ordered the patio chair cover lounge M 30x37x31. It's big but very heavy, and with the clips and elastic cording adjusted I was able to get a good fit. We were under tornado warnings most of the night last night and they didn't budge.
customer_reviews.author: Debra C.

customer_reviews.title: Look great but not for intense sun
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my teak rockers. They looked great and fit well. No problem with them staying on in a wind. I'm in Florida and this material does not hold up to the sun here. I think someone in northern midwest or New England would get quite a few years out of them but here in FL only good for 12-14 months. One dry rotted and ripped just after a year and the other lasted about 15 months. I've bought replacements but if the next two only yield the same performance, I'll check into Rovena products, as they're supposed to be better in the direct sun.
customer_reviews.author: Paul1948

customer_reviews.title: Look to be all that I could ask for in a patio chair cover
customer_reviews.text: Looking always for the best quality for the best price & these seem to fit the bill. I have 2 large wood frame & cushioned patio chairs that get some measure of sun all year, blown in dirt & rain. I've already replaced one set of cushions & my husband keeps up the wood, that's getting to be costly & tiresome at our age. We're hoping these will save us some of that cost & effort for years to come...only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Grams

customer_reviews.title: Condensation
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to protect my new patio chairs from the elements. Have had only minimal rain with one storm being brief and heavy. Lots of humid and hot weather with high dew points. I noticed droplets of water on the underside of the covers even when the top is dry so I am thinking this is condensation. Not what I expected would happen. It defeats the purpose of the covers. I know these are not waterproof but rather water repellent which is definitely evident. Just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: onlinealot

customer_reviews.title: Work wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: These fit large clubs chairs with ease and are made with thick high quality water repellent fabric. The draw string allows you to tighten the bottom and the built in handles with mesh air pockets are icing on the cake. Nice looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in mid-May and it is now late-August of the same year. As my husband was putting the covers back on both ripped, one throughout the entire top and the other on a corner, he had to quickly tape them up as a storm was coming in. We haven't had them long enough for it to be sun or wind damage, just cheap material I guess. What a shame, they looked better than they performed
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy had for two years
customer_reviews.text: Good quality trust me.! You cant go wrong with these. Or you can go buy outdoor furniture every year.
customer_reviews.author: Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Material os not too heavy but not to light - just right. Feels like expensive cover - not a garbage bag or tarp like. Perfect color match to the other patio pieces for my grill, toaster over, & sofas. Tons of room and nice handles for putting on.
customer_reviews.author: Evil coco bean

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality that lasts
customer_reviews.text: I have had these covers for over 2 years. Not only is the quality superior, they are easy to put on and off, but you can also wash them in the washer if need be with nothing but they look great results. You will not be sorry with this purchase. I bought more chairs this year and they were my first go to! They even have fire pit covers. The price is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up to 8 months of use over two summers.
customer_reviews.text: After two seasons of (only ~4 mo per year) use, the cover has developed a large tear not associated with a seam. I had hoped it would have lasted a few seasons more. We also have a sectional cover made by the same company that tore within days of this one so it clearly was not a fluke situation. We treated both with care, but they clearly cannot hold up to sun exposure over this period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Radium

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wear well
customer_reviews.text: When we lived in the East coast subs had a shed that we stored the furniture in over the winter. When we move to Chicago we bought new furniture for or roof deck and had to cover it all year due to the weather Liked the at first, but only lasted about two years. They got stiff from the sun and ripped. Another one for my lounge chair ripped after a year. I have to buy all new covers. I guess I will have to spend more
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: We keep our outdoor furniture completely covered at all times, yet every time we remove these, the cushions are not only wet, but covered with debris. I can understand them not being completely waterproof, but we don't understand how so much debris get on the cushions. These covers cover the furniture completely and reach to the floor. It's a mystery.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but fit very snug and not completely covering ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but fit very snug and not completely covering my outdoor chair all the way to the bottom. It will function and is of good quality but wished I had ordered a size larger even though I measured the chair and compared the measurements to the ones in the description. I think it runs smaller than the stated measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely necessary for longevity of patio furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and does what it is suppose to do. Make sure you the couch cushions are dryer before applying the covers otherwise it will trap the moisture and keep them wet even if the sun is out and possibly lead to mold growth.
customer_reviews.author: Samson Gebre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our over-sized chairs; does not hold up well, rips easily after a season.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these covers as they are the only reasonably priced covers that fit over my over-sized swivel chairs. They look great when new, however after about a season they start to get brittle and will rip easily. I try to purchase these in the two pack when they are discounted/used as I need at least one a year as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kimo

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up for even an entire year.
customer_reviews.text: Keep looking. Originally I bought these and figured even if we only got 1 year protection out of these it would prob be worth the cheaper price. They didn't even make it through 1 season. I just purchased 4 more from another cover company w/a 3 year warrantee for a mere $20 more. Keep looking! These are not your covers.
customer_reviews.author: Leelee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit and Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them for 2 weeks but was quite impressed with the quality for the price! Let's hope they hold up after reading all the wonderful reviews! They fit our furniture perfectly! A little room to move over all of it which is good! Not a tight fit; happy because that's what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Cunha

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: 9 month Update: All covers are ripped in various places. I'm patching them as I go. I suspect these will be mostly patches in another 9 months. 5 months: Don't last, can't recommend. After about 5 months 2 of the covers are already ripping.
customer_reviews.author: Street 5.0

customer_reviews.title: Great covers!
customer_reviews.text: These chair covers are a second purchase for me. My first set finally bit the dust after 5 years in the CO weather extremes. They held up extremely well to ice, snow, extreme southern exposure sun. For this reason, I repurchased. The covers have an adjustable elastic cinch cord around the bottom as well as a nylon strap that clicks together to secure to your chair. I love how roomy they are and the handles at the top back of the cover to help move the chairs. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Socalmary1

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of chair covers to replace torn originals. These seem to be standing up to the weather very well. Only wish I could had gone one size smaller as these are too big and do bunch up on the deck. (my bad)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets of the large lounge chair covers by this same company in the past year. I ordered 2 of the mediums this time because the chairs they were intended for are smaller. The Mediums are THE EXACT SAME SIZE AS THE LARGE. I’m not sure what happened, but the mediums I received are the same dimensions as the larges I ordered in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Cosley

customer_reviews.title: Touch of Class
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to “dress up” my patio furniture, while adding quality protection when not in use. Boy did this product deliver! Fit was oversized with strong fasteners for windy days. Worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: D Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great cover but not easy to secure the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and it looks durable. I'll see how well it does after a summer in the hot humid south. I have it covering 4 chairs and it definitely protects. I wonder how long the waterproofing will last? My only complaint is that the cord sewn into the bottom circumference is elastic, and that coupled with the high friction cloth makes it near impossible to actually use the cinch cord. I took it off the chairs and worked with the cloth and cord. After about 15 minutes of doing that I got it reasonably tight.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric material.  Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for less than 2 years. The material is disintegrating. The cover is cracking in numerous places. I've had to use duck tape to repair many areas on my chair covers. The hold down straps are rotting and have torn away. This product looks good when it arrives but should not be breaking down within 18 months of purchase. I'd like new covers or Amazon should STOP selling this product.
customer_reviews.author: William Peck

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, Lasts about 6 months in Texas heat
customer_reviews.text: We purchased three of these six months ago, and they all have holes where the cover sits against the corners of the furniture. They have not been abused, the fabric has just become very poor after being in the weather. The funny thing is, it is just starting to get hot. They have not even had to survive the worst of what Texas has to offer. Can't believe Amazon allows such a terrible product
customer_reviews.author: davenkim

customer_reviews.title: Two years in harsh weather and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: This product, along with all my Veranda patio furniture covers, have been excellent. I bought them two years ago and they are still doing very well. I have them on an outdoor patio with lots of rain and really strong wind and they are still in excellent shape. I have bought at least 10 of these and all are doing great. I strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Karger

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Best ones have ever bought. Durable, waterproof and won’t ever buy less expensive
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, degrade after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: These covers were used on individual chairs on a roof top patio. The Material degrade after 1 year and started to dust into our couches. The material was so weak that small hail started to cause punctures. We have others covers that are amazon basics that have continued to maintain their quality while these went to the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Jumex123

customer_reviews.title: Great cover. Stop shopping around you found it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels luxurious. It is a high quality fabric with a noticeable thickness and quality of build. It is well stitched and looks great on the furniture. This product appears well thought out and constructed. It had vents and hand holds, cinch straps and draw strings to secure in place and allow venting. I would definitely buy again but feel that it will last and I won't need to repurchase for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very good material and beautiful cover, customer happy!
customer_reviews.text: My Chair measure is: 26.4 X 28.74 X 28.54 and this cover measure 30Wx37Dx31H so it is a little bigger than my chair even as i loved and I preferred as because in this way is more safe take out it from the bench avoiding damage the Being to much Tight. It is really protecting my outdoor furniture set. I like how it looks like, water resistant I bought the whole covers for my outdoor set. I add pictures about my set with covers and without for you can compare with kind the furniture this will be fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fredell

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Covers fit my chairs well. I recommend measuring and triple checking the size before ordering. Fabric is sturdy and the handles make it easy to put the cover on and off. Chairs are on a covered porch so I am unsure about the water resistance. Delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and function at great price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the patio chair covers for furniture on a screened-in porch, so they get wet but not drenched. So far, am very happy with this purchase. Easy to pull on and off the furniture, yet heavy and substantial enough not to get blown off by wind. It also has a Velcro band to keep it snug. I think it would be very good for complete outdoor use, too.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very versatile as they fit all kinds of different brands of chairs. We love how well they hold up in the Florida wearther from the harsh sun to the daily rain we get some times. Great quality and price. They shipped fasat and have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Hymn.Life

customer_reviews.title: Covers and protects well
customer_reviews.text: This works well to shield cushions from the elements including rain. After about two years, however, it gets brittle and splits if not handled VERY carefully. I am content with that and this is my second purchase of the same item, so I don't know if there are better ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Nope, not again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these in July of 2018, I’m online now looking to purchase 4 more from a different company. These things don’t last, already dry rotting and my wicker chairs and cushions are wet. Junk, spend your money elsewhere unless you like buying new ones every 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things about these covers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these covers for my patio set and they arrived very quickly. I read many reviews where people were confused about the size. I went directly to the manufacturer website, which tells you exactly which size to order based on the dimensions of your furniture. The ones I got are quite large, but I love the drawstring and buckle. I just wish the chair covers had more than one buckle (the reason for only 4 stars). They are made of heavy canvas and feel like they're well made and durable. I guess I will find out after the first rain whether they keep things dry.
customer_reviews.author: kld311

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty protection
customer_reviews.text: Purchased four of these with matching grill cover. Heavy duty and well worth it to protect our furniture - that stuff is not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Capogreco

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sturdy Outdoor Chair Covers
customer_reviews.text: Bought one set of these for our 4 new wicker resin swivel, rocking chairs by our fire pit to protect from the AZ hot sun and dust. The covers have held up just fine. There's a pull draw string, but they fit over our chairs nicely without having to use it. Each cover also has handles if needed. Easy to put on and take off. Fold up nicely to put away when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: JP-AZ

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these covers
customer_reviews.text: I have bought five different sizes of this brand and they have kept our expensive outdoor furniture very protected! These covers do cover very well and have hoops on the bottom to place under the chair/table feet. We live in Arizona where we have much dust and monsoon season and so far these covers have held up very well since March of this year! I highly recommend these covers.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Beau

customer_reviews.title: Thick material.
customer_reviews.text: Thick material unlike the duck brand which tore after 1 year. Hopefully this will last a couple years at least.
customer_reviews.author: Sukayna

customer_reviews.title: They're ok if you want to replace them every year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these last year. By the end of the season, one had cracked and peeled on the inside, causing flecks of vinyl to be stuck all over the cushions, not to mention that water was getting through the cracks as well. I replaced that one in the spring, and now the other 3 are doing the same thing. So I'll be tossing them at the end of this season and looking for something else. Also, as one reviewer commented, "they're so loose fitting that they turn into sails in a windstorm". I've had to chase my chairs around the patio a number of times.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Looked good new, but less than 1 year later...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these. Got 2 of these for our patio chairs outside, where we don't get snow, just sun and rain and at first they worked great, but after 7 months, the strings that tighten at the bottom to keep it tight against the furniture dried up and broke. I don't man-handle these either, they just become very brittle over obviously a short period of time. It still is working enough to protect the furniture so far which is why it didn't get 1 star, but the quality is very disappointing. Got these for the sofa as well and have the exact same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy storage
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these covers. Love them. Easy to use. Easy to store and truly do their job. We live in a "tough" winter area and these hold up great. We use it to cover outdoor furniture, a/c unit, fire pit. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: U. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had purchased these years ago. No more sun fading or damage to our cushions. Amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anjelika James

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product line for our deck table, and needed to replace for our chairs as well. Love the quality of the fabric, the durability, ability to repel water. Should hold up much better than last set I had
customer_reviews.author: RG of Poulsbo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This patio chair cover fit perfectly on my club chairs, it appears sturdy and secures easily to chair. Ive had a week of rain and wind and so far this cover has worked well, it stayed secure to my furniture and the water just beaded off. The fabric is thick and protects from sun fading as well. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: We have 6 matching chair and table set that is over 25 years old. Every couple of years I buy a new cover set. They stay out in all kinds of weather and look wonderful when not using the chairs. Because of these covers I have NEVER bought new cushions for these chairs. The cushions still look brand new
customer_reviews.author: PATTI

customer_reviews.title: recommend buying it
customer_reviews.text: it is more than 8 months in the heat of the sun and coldness of the night and still looks brand new. Recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Ram Bag

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 2 seasons before tearing to touch
customer_reviews.text: We had this cover on two chairs and another Classic Accessories Veranda cover on a sofa. All 3 started tearing in large portions to only touch and very light handling (putting on/off furniture infrequently) after only 20 months of constant use in the mild San Diego weather (including 2 summers). These did fit well, but overall very disappointing and would not purchase again. In contrast, I had AmazonBasics covers on other patio furniture and grill in same environment has no issues and remains strong to touch and handling.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tou

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting & Great Protection!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these and they are exactly what I needed and had in mind to cover my outdoor furniture. They were purchased in 2013 and I'm going on my fifth spring and summer with these. They look like new aside from a bit of fading. Later I got the fire pit cover and it is just as good. Don't hesitate to buy if you want quality and longevity. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: don't you wish you knew

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product on April of 2018. So we are just beginning our third season (we live in the Northeast so we only have these outside for a few months each year). Already the water protection is poor. The durability is extremely poor. There are tears throughout that I continually need to duct tape. We had purchased these products a number of years ago and got 6 or 7 seasons out them. Clearly, they have been cost-reduced as the product quality is now poor. I would not purchase these again nor would I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: AGS

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof protection
customer_reviews.text: Exlcellent protection for outdoor furniture that’s not on a patio. Bought several styles. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn d.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Okay but doesn’t last long. I’ve had for less than two year and one cover ripped with when taking it off the furniture. It’s like it is disintegrating! Don’t think I’d buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Nice patio cover
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good quality cover. Doesn’t blow away like other cheaper one. Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Both chair covers ripped within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The style is nice and they seemed like they would be good. But after less than 2 weeks both lounge chair covers ripped and we only took them on and off twice because it has rained so much lately. Very disappointed. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: these don't last
customer_reviews.text: These were used on my porch to cover my furniture. We only removed and recovered the furniture maybe 5 times so barely messed with. They are all worn super thin and have several holes. Only order these id you plan to replace them every year. I purchased 6 in different sizes... all of them are in poor shape after 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: chambers2335

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, won't last in harsh winters
customer_reviews.text: They feel good, looks great and lasts only a year, i live in Chicago with harsh weather, snow piles up and tears up the armpits seam on second winter. Sun dries up the fabric and makes it brittle I now buy cheap Chinese stuff and lasts same but i save a lot of money
customer_reviews.author: W. D. Hinkelmann

customer_reviews.title: A must buy! Def worth it!
customer_reviews.text: A freaking must buy!!!!! Very very very water proof! Went through pretty much a flood this past week, just took them off today since it was finally sunny and every cushion and pillow absolutely dry!!!! Video was the night before! Picture the very next day! Dry as a bone!
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Covers tear quite easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 chair covers and 2 sofa covers, have used them for less than a year and 3 already have tears in them. Just taking the covers off and pulling them back on were cause for 2 of the rips. I thought the material was very durable, but apparently not as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: These products ARE the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Many Thanks to Classic accessories Lindsey Robles for her determined patience in the size exchange of the 8 chair covers. These products ARE the best on the market, We have gone through a whole bunch of other brands, but when our BBQ cover lasted more than 5 years in gale force winds and came out looking like new, we bought covers for EVERYTHING outdoors in our HIGH WIND PACIFIC NORTHWEST SALTY SEA BLOWN STORMS!
customer_reviews.author: Camano Val

customer_reviews.title: Read This Before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Let's get right to it. If you are looking for something to keep the dust and debris off your patio furniture then this is the product for you. If you are like me and looking for something water resistant/ proof then do not get these. The rain beads at first ( water resistant ) then eventually penetrates and absolutely soaks your cushions underneath. How this almost got 5 stars is truly beyond me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Yochem

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is heavy. I bought two of them. The love seat one and this chair cover. Both are great. I like the neutral color too. I have had them for two seasons now. I think they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Flagg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Got these for 2 wrought iron chairs that are left outside year round. I have a round table with 4 chairs, a rectangular table with 6 chairs and 2 chaise lounges for which I have covers by this manufacturer. Those covers have endured a winter with ice, snow and rain and held up very well. I like the draw string sound the bottom of the cover that helps secure it. I wash them before I put them up after last winter. I gave them 4 stars because I'm still waiting to see how durable they will be otherwise I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lawhon

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how good the quality
customer_reviews.text: Having shopped around for good quality chair covers for several months, we were surprised to see these on sale during the Amazon July event and bought 4 for our oversized wicker. The sizing is generous with locking bungee drawstring at the base. I can tell the material will not dry and crack over time. There are built in air vents allowing air to move and prevent mold. (important for our rainy winters). The piping along the bottom helps weight the covers. It looks as if these were custom made for our furniture. These beat anything I have seen in big box or home improvement stores. the quality is worth the price. We will be buying additional for our dining set.
customer_reviews.author: David Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product line
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product line! We've purchased Classic Accessories for covers for all of our patio pieces (large patio table, bistro table, b-b-q, chaise lounges) and couldn't be happier. They've held up well throughout the year. Granted, California winters are mild - but we are satisfied. Do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair covers
customer_reviews.text: Great covers, The anchors keep them in place even in high winds. Protected our outdoor furniture very well. Easy to get on and off. They have held up well so far, but it has only been 8 months. They do not get alot of sun were they are, We like the sofa cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: Skibum

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily. Poor quality. See my pics.
customer_reviews.text: Really bad quality. I purchased this June 2,2018. There were holes by the next year. Not even 2 years now and they are shredded. I also purchased bench cover and a fire table cover from this same collection. All Bad. I live in California where the weather is mild too.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Jonsson

customer_reviews.title: Do not last
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in fall of 2017 and all four of them have huge tears in them. I left our teak chairs on the back patio with covers and had hoped these covers would last more than a year and a half. Going to try the kind next with a 3-year warranty by Covermate.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great covers - we bought a set about 4 years ago and only now replacing them after an incident with spilled paint. Hold up to the strong sun here in Texas fine and I like the clips and bungee cords to make sure there is a secure fit. We bought the match table and chair cover for a new outdoor dining set and it’s also a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: KWTexas

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty material has withstood several heavy rainstorms. Well stitched fabric handles aid in putting on and taking off covers. The cover material is heavy duty. The covers are large enough to fully cover our outdoor chairs. The cover bottoms also have both a tightening drawstring and a strap & buckle system.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water protection
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I purchased these covers as we have been getting a lot of rain this year. Since receiving, the chairs have always been available for immediate use after rain. I also like the Velcro straps which prevents the covers from flying away on windy days. Size is still too big for my chairs, even trying to adjust there is a lot of slack.
customer_reviews.author: JerryM

customer_reviews.title: Great.... at first
customer_reviews.text: Looked and seemed of great quality at first. So much so, I purchased a matching product for my grill. They lasted for about 1 1/2 years and then they started ripping. It seems to me the material started to weaken as it was exposed to the sun / ultraviolet light. I live in New England so the sun is not so intense. Looking for a new product now.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item from my previous order . When I go in to order this product again form my order history I would expect the same item, it was not ans was much larger than my original order. Beware, when ordering form your history as it will not be the same item.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Newlin

customer_reviews.title: Decent but 1 flaw
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 3 stars because there is no real way to fasten these to the chair so they wont lift off the chair in high winds. They keep working themselves loose and we almost lost a couple in a thunderstorm. Had they made the plastic pinch together clips on both sides of the cover, it would've been much better for midwest winds.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Vandeloo

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly - high quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly - high quality I think that this is a great value, especially because it is so well made, and well worth the minimal investment to prolong the life of your outdoor chairs
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Plemel-Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Covers don;t last, i bought 4 covers plus umbrella covers and they feel apart withing 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Covers all rip, did not last and i emailed seller with no response. they fell apart 6 months after i purchased with no answer. I been putting outdoor furniture inside but now i am looking to order something better so must spent money again.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: look nice, keep chairs dry
customer_reviews.text: These covers look nice and keep our outdooor chairs dry.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Did not last the 3 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: We have had these covers for less than 2 years. They all have tears. I am assuming it is from the heat of the sun. We are very careful with the covers and do not have pets or children who might be rough with the material
customer_reviews.author: Ken Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Works great for about a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: If your patio furniture is constantly exposed to sun and rain then these will last about a year and a half before they start tearing at the corners. I’ve gone thru two sets for both my chairs and loveseat. I’m trying another brand this year to see if I can find something a little more durable. They do protect well from the rain until they start to break down.
customer_reviews.author: Melynda

customer_reviews.title: good while it lasted, but lasted only 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Good looking cover and seemed very durable where I expected it to exceed the 3-year warranty, so I was surprised that in it's second season it began to tear and needed replacement. Just over 1 year of use. We'll see how Classic Accessories' warranty claim process goes.
customer_reviews.author: ltskier

customer_reviews.title: Super product at a super low price!
customer_reviews.text: These covers are simply great. I don't know how you could do better at any price! Buy them, you won' be disappointed. I'm hard to please and they are one of my top Amazon purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Denna Ketchum

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these covers to protect outdoor seating from the elements. The furniture and covers are only out during the warm weather months. After two years, these covers are no longer protecting my furniture. Rain is leaking through and then puddling on the furniture that needed protection. I have applied multiple coatings of scotchgard to the covers, and that has not helped. If you need these to last more than a year or two, don’t waste your time...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, good fit ... and stands up very well to rain and high winds. Like that there's also a couple clips at bottom to attach to chair legs in addition to the elastic cord to tighten a bit.
customer_reviews.author: PJSinop

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Functional
customer_reviews.text: They are attractive, easy to put on and remove and 3 of the four have lasted 3 (or is it 4?) years but are wearing thin; the fourth tore and had to be replaced. I will buy 3 more next year.
customer_reviews.author: Cushing

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: For the $$ these are very nice. Be-careful when you open your package if using a knife. I accidentally cut through mine when opening, but repaired it and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: bryan conkling

customer_reviews.title: Only works for a year
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a year, but tore easily after that. I duck taped it for a while, but now it is tearing just when I move it off the furniture. For something that should protect furniture, I expect this to last more than 2 years. Absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories Veranda Water-Resistant 38 Inch Patio Lounge Chair Cover
product_meta.description:
Size:Large LoungeThis patio lounge chair cover provides elegant protection against the elements. It is made of Gardelle protective fabric system and fits wicker, lounge and spring patio chairs up to 38" wide. Care instructions: Use water and a soft brush and then line dry. Do not use soap or put it in a dryer as that will damage the protective coating on the fabric.

BRAND STORY
By Classic Accessories
feature_bullets: The classic accessories difference: CA Veranda Patio chair covers have interior bound seams for strength, high density stitching for durability, padded handles for comfort, matching webbing for a great look and California Prop 65 compliance for health and safety

Heavy duty patio furniture cover: Guaranteed to fit lounge chairs 35 inch long x 38 inch deep x 31 inch high. Use water and a soft brush and then line dry,do not use soap or put it in a dryer as that will damage the protective coating on the fabric

Weatherproof and water resistant: Protect Outdoor Furniture with Patio Covers designed with Gardelle Fabric System keeping your patio lounge chairs dry and safe with an elegant water resistant fabric top, a protective waterproof backing and a protective dark splash guard skirt
Custom fit patio cover: The convenient draw string hem and buckled straps keep the chair cover protecting your lounge chairs on the windiest days
Outdoor furniture cover with warranty: This patio lounge chair cover comes with a three Year limited warranty
Durable cover with advanced features: Large padded handles make removal of this chair cover easy, while air vents reduce inside condensation and wind lofting
Classic accessories veranda variety: You'll be sure to find the right patio covers to fit your needs with over 140 shapes and styles in the Veranda Collection from Classic Accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,339 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
